extendedInfo.description: Movie Quiz 2000s is a thrilling single player and two player trivia game about movies and actors from 2000 - 2010.How well do you know you favorite movies? Here is the chance to test your movie skills and see if you're as good as you think.Please note that questions are in English.The quiz / trivia game features a single player and a thrilling two player heads-up mode.- Sharpen your skills in the single player mode and reach the top of the high score list.- In the heads-up mode you can challenge your friends on the same phone and see who is the movie Einstein.- Questions about movies and Oscar from famous movies such as from Harry Potter, Batman Begins, The Dark Knight, The Lord of the Rings, Kung Fu Panda, Star Wars, The Matrix, Twilight, Shrek, James Bond, pirates of the caribbean ...and many other movies.- Questions about actors such as Johnny Depp, Scarlett Johansson, Matt Damon, Jude Law, Brad Pitt, Jack Nicholson, Natalie Portman, George Clooney, Leonardo DiCaprio, Clint Eastwood, Reese Witherspoon,Sean Penn, Shia LaBeouf, Nicole Kidman, Christian Bale, Angelina Jolie, Tom Cruise, Jamie Foxx and many more.

reviews.title: Spam app
reviews.comment: Since installing this i\'ve been repeatly getting spam in my notifications area ... DON\'T INSTALL THIS APP.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LMFAO
reviews.comment: Why would it ask me Jake gyllenhal played Donnie darko in which movie? Especially when the title is his name lmfao
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Craig
reviews.comment: If you get the first answer right, just keep hitting any answer after that and you win a two player game!
reviews.author: A Google User
